roleset.name: assign a label or attribute
roleset.note: CLASS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'class' based on transformation of 'classify', which is the same word, after all. (from class.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Her recent report classes the stock as a ``hold.''

roleset.name: elegant
roleset.note: CLASSY-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. Related to class-v (from classy.01-j)

example.text: Princess Diana was classy because she wore her collars turned up and talked posh;
